content: Is it possible to change the name associated with an email address in the archived messages? (https://leanprover-community.github.io/archive/ Link: https://leanprover-community.github.io/archive/

As far as I can see in the archive, there's no association of names and email addresses in that archive, just plain string names. Unfortunately that archive is quite old now, and I'm not even sure who last touched it.
